txt.en: '[placeholder], I fear there is little time to lose. Go to Echad Eregion, far to the south and east, and speak with Golgallon. Warn him that there may yet be signs of the Company's passing in the wild.'

'If only these were new tidings you bring me, [placeholder]. Alas, we have ourselves seen signs of the Company's passing. I fear they have already been discovered.\n\n'Nevertheless, we must take no chances. There is much work to be done....'
'Speak with my kinsman Golgallon at Echad Eregion. Warn him that the Company's path may be compromised by the carelessness of the halflings.'

Maedlathron is concerned that the hobbits or Gimli the dwarf may have dropped something else upon their journey which may divulge to the Enemy the way of their passing and the composition of the Company.
Talk to Golgallon at Echad Eregion
Golgallon is at Echad Eregion, far to the south-east of Gwingris.\n\nMaedlathron has asked you to warn Golgallon that the Company may have left further signs of their passing in the wild.
